docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Detekt
docs.text:
For Kotlin Multiplatform projects Detekt (v1.23.8) won't automatically exclude build folders from scanning (and end up failing with incorrect style for generated code 🤨). The solution is to exclude it manually:

build.gradle.kts
tasks.withType<Detekt>().configureEach {
    exclude { element ->
        element.file.path.contains("/build/generated/")
    }
}
